description: User perception analysis involves understanding how users perceive and interact with AI systems. This can include evaluating user feedback, improving transparency, and ensuring that AI-generated content meets user expectations.
you_have_this_if: You receive inconsistent feedback from users about your AI system.
Users express confusion about how your AI makes decisions.
You notice a significant drop in user engagement with your AI-generated content.
Your AI system's responses are often misinterpreted by users.
You are tasked with improving user trust in AI interactions.

approaches.best_for: When designing AI systems that require user interaction and evaluating user feedback.
approaches.key_tradeoff: This technique provides insights into user perceptions but may require extensive data collection.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need to analyze user feedback to improve AI transparency and user trust.

start_here: Begin with Contextual Bias Analysis as it directly addresses user perceptions and provides actionable insights for improving AI interactions.
